articles.headline: Beware Examining FBI Data
articles.summary: The article discusses the challenges and discrepancies reporters face when using FBI's Uniform Crime Reports for crime statistics.

articles.headline: Computer Records Reveal Environmental Havoc
articles.summary: Fabey explores flaws in state pesticide enforcement systems, using data to uncover regulatory failures in protecting the public.

articles.headline: Elevator Inspections Show Bad Rides
articles.summary: Armstrong reveals safety failures in elevators and escalators through data analysis, leading to significant state-level repercussions.

articles.headline: On the Internet: Disaster Sites to Tap
articles.summary: The article provides a guide to Internet resources available for journalists covering natural disasters.
